findings.title: Owner can add/remove addresses in whitelist
findings.description: The owner has privileges to add or remove addresses from the whitelist.

findings.title: Owner can change MAX_NEW_NFT_COUNT_LIMIT
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the MAX_NEW_NFT_COUNT_LIMIT, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change addressManager address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the addressManager address.

findings.title: Owner can change metadataChanger address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the metadataChanger address.

findings.title: Owner can add/remove minters
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to add or remove minters, which could lead to unauthorized token creation or manipulation.

findings.title: Owner can change BaseURI
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the BaseURI.

findings.title: Minters can mint and burn tokens
findings.description: Minters have the privilege to create new tokens and remove existing ones.

findings.title: Owner can change addresses
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify addresses in the contract.

findings.title: Owner can withdraw contract ERC20 tokens and native tokens
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw contract ERC20 tokens and native tokens.

findings.title: Owner can change addressManager
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the addressManager address.

findings.title: Owner can pause/unpause contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to pause or unpause the contract.

findings.title: Owner can add/remove minters
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to add or remove minters, which could lead to unauthorized token creation or manipulation.

findings.title: Owner can change fee
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the fee, which could lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can include/exclude address in no fee array
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to include or exclude addresses from the no fee array.

findings.title: DoS with block gas limit
findings.description: The contract may be vulnerable to a Denial of Service (DoS) attack due to the block gas limit.
